name: microsoft-office-365-feed
label: Microsoft Office 365 Feed
description: Ingest the IP, URLs used by Office 365 using the web service provided by Microsoft. The fetched indicators can be used to create a whitelist, blacklist etc. for your SIEM or firewall services.\nThis connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Regions
fields.description: Select the regions from where you want to fetch indicators. You can select multiple regions. If you want to retrieve indicators from all regions, then you need to individually select each region.
fields.name: regions

fields.title: Services
fields.description: Select the services for which you want to fetch indicators. If you want to retrieve indicators for all services, select the “All” option.
fields.name: services

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Fetch indicators for an IP Address or a URL or both from the Microsoft Office 365 Feeds.

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: indicator_type
parameters.description: Select the type of indicator that you want to fetch from Office 365 Feeds. You can choose from the following options: IPs, URLs, or Both.

parameters.title: Modified After
parameters.name: last_pull_time
parameters.tooltip: Value as an Epoch Timestamp. Indicators data will be returned only if the feed has been refreshed after this time.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the value as an Epoch Timestamp. Specify the time the feeds were last pulled from Microsoft Office 365 Feeds. In this case, the indicators will be returned from Microsoft Office 365 Feeds only if the feed has been refreshed after the specified time. This is used in scheduled data ingestion to fetch feeds incrementally since the last successful pull.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of indicators that should be returned in a single required. This controls the number of indicators by limiting feeds count in a single request. Note: The option of Pagination is not available.
